message_history.content:
A conversation between User and Assistant. The user asks a question, and the Assistant answers it. The Assistant analyzes the given question and information in the mind, retains important relevant information, calls a search engine to find necessary information, accesses web pages with certain urls, and provides the user with the answer. The Assistant conducts search by <search> query </search>, access certain url by <access> url </access>, and the top search results and url page will be returned between <information> and </information>.  The reasoning processes are enclosed within <think> </think>. Finally, the Assistant provides answer inside <answer> and </answer>, i.e. <answer> answer here </answer>. If there are multiple queries, ensure all answers are enclosed within <answer> </answer>, seperated with comma. 

Note: the question is a valid question and you should try to find a correct answer. 

User: I want to research Apple Inc.’s product development history by compiling a list of each generation of its flagship smartphone product line (e.g., iPhone, iPhone 3G, iPhone 3GS, … up to the iPhone 15 series) released in the U.S. market between January 9, 2007 (the original iPhone’s launch date), and December 31, 2024. 
For each model, please provide:
• Product name  
• Launch year  
• Storage capacity (separate multiple options by /, e.g. 4GB/8GB)  
• Official launch price in USD (listed separately for different capacities,e.g., $199/$299 )  
• One key new technology or feature introduced with that generation (a widely recognized highlight promoted by Apple, such as “first to support the App Store,” “first Retina display,” or “introduction of Face ID”).  
Only include the standard flagship models released each September or October (i.e., the main iPhone series and their Plus/Pro variants), excluding non-flagship lines like the SE or C series. If the launch price or key new feature cannot be confirmed, leave that field blank in the table.

Please output the sorted data in the format of one Markdown table. The column names in the table are: Product, Launch Year, Capacity, Launch Price (USD), Core New Technologies/Features.
Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```

Assistant: 
<think>

To find the information about Apple's flagship smartphone product line, I'll search through reliable sources. </think>
<search> apple iphone product development history by compiling a list of each generation of its flagship smartphone product line </search>

Search query: apple iphone product development history by compiling a list of each generation of its flagship smartphone product line
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IPhone):
iPhone - Wikipedia The iPhone is a line of smartphones developed and marketed by Apple that run iOS, the company's own mobile operating system. The first-generation iPhone was ...

Every iPhone Generation: A Full History of Release Dates - IGN Apple released multiple iPhone lines in some years, and every year new phones are released regardless. Below, we've compiled every iPhone ever released in ...

iPhone History: From the Original iPhone to iPhone 16 - Seamgen Apple's first iPhone was announced by Steve Jobs on January 9, 2007, and it was released on June 29, 2007. Priced at $499 for the 4GB model and $599 for the 8GB ...

[Doc 4](https://setapp.com/how-to/every-iphone-release-in-chronological-order?srsltid=AfmBOorXwNx-7TWnZjsJNIfaoTzJbaCYDOdMw41AAXssrDAvfN20kC5y):
Every iPhone release date in chronological order: 2007–2025 Apple has released 51 iPhone models from 2007 to 2025. Starting with the original iPhone in 2007, Apple has consistently launched new models every year.

[Doc 5](https://www.theverge.com/23316437/iphone-visual-history-apple-design-models):
The iPhone turns 15: a visual history of every model to date Steve Jobs introduced the iPhone onstage in 2007, and it changed the cellphone market forever. This visual history details the iPhone, 3G, ...

I need to focus on retrieving the specific information for each iPhone model released between 2007 and 2024, including product name, launch year, storage capacity, launch price, and a key new technology or feature. I'll search for each model individually.

Search query: iphone 3gs launch year
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IPhone_3GS):
iPhone 3GS - Wikipedia It was released in the United States, Canada, and six European countries on June 19, 2009, in Australia and Japan on June 26, and internationally in July and ...

When was my iPhone 3GS released I know they were first ... - Reddit You only need the third, fourth, and fifth digits of the serial number to know. Specifically, XX925XXXXXX means week 25 of 2009, or between June 15 and June 21 ...

Every iPhone released, in order - CNBC The iPhone 3GS, launched in 2009, had an S for "speed." It featured a faster processor than its predecessor and was able to cruise on even ...

19 years ago today, January 9, 2007 the first iPhone was ... - Facebook 19 years ago today, January 9, 2007 the first iPhone was announced. Mine still works today. #iPhone #apple.
